result.execSummary:
Cody S. Soderstrom was found not guilty on all charges in this case. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Cody S. Soderstrom is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Found Not Guilty at Jury Trial

charges.dispoDesc: Found Not Guilty at Jury Trial

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody S. Soderstrom

records.addlTxt: Defendant Cody S. Soderstrom in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Mark Walter Frank in court for Cody S. Soderstrom. See clerk's minutes.

Defendant Cody S. Soderstrom in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Mark Walter Frank in court for Cody S. Soderstrom. Eighteen jurors seated. Jurors sworn. Voir dire held. Peremptory strikes made. Twelve jurors selected for trial. Jurors excused at 9:50. State heard on Witness Rood's failure to appear. State moves for continuance to obtain witness and possibly issue warrant and order to show cause. Defendant objects and requests dismissal. Court will recess for an hour to see if law enforcement can locate witness. Jurors enter. Court advises jurors we are searching for a witness before trial begins. Jurors excused from 10:03 to 10:45. Recess. Court resumes out of presence of jury. Defendant has been located in Shullsburg, Wisconsin. Law enforcement is transporting him to court at this time. Trial can proceed.

Defendant Cody S. Soderstrom in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Mark Walter Frank in court for Cody S. Soderstrom. Witness lists reviewed. Prior convictions addressed and set as follows: Rood - 6, Barner - 0, Berg - 0, Soderstrom - 0. Defendant does not intend to testify at this point. Colluquy given by court. Court addressed pretrial issues and motions in limine.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Status conference on May 11, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Cody S. Soderstrom appeared by video.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant's zoom appearance is unauthorized. Defendant does not have an attorney was hoping to represent himself. Defendant is currently not employed. Has not checked with SPD to see if he qualifies. Court gives defendant SPD number and reviews right to counsel options. Defendant to call SPD to see if he qualifies. State heard on defendant not returning signed bond yet. Status date set.
copy sent to def. for signature 01/24/22

Defendant Cody S. Soderstrom appeared by zoom video, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant acknowledged service and waives further reading. Court reviewed charges, penalties and right to counsel with Defendant. Defendant pleads Not Guilty, court accepts plea. Sets for $500 Signature bond. Clerk will mail bond for signature. Status: 4/13/22 at 11:00 a.m. Jury Trial weeks: 4/26 & 5/3.
Status conference scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 11:00 am.
